(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (VP (VBG wanting)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB write)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ proper) (NNP Pizza) (NN recipe) (NN post))
                (ADVP (RB ever))
                (SBAR (IN since)
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP I))
                    (VP
                      (VP (VBD started)
                        (S
                          (VP (VBG experimenting)
                            (PP (IN with)
                              (NP
                                (NP (NNS pizzas))
                                (ADVP
                                  (NP (CD three) (NNS years))
                                  (RB ago)))))))
                      (CC but)
                      (ADVP (RB never))
                      (VP
                        (ADVP (RB really))
                        (VBD got)
                        (NP (NN round))
                        (PP (TO to)
                          (NP (PRP it)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(wanting-4, I-1)
aux(wanting-4, have-2)
aux(wanting-4, been-3)
root(ROOT-0, wanting-4)
aux(write-6, to-5)
xcomp(wanting-4, write-6)
det(post-11, a-7)
amod(post-11, proper-8)
nn(post-11, Pizza-9)
nn(post-11, recipe-10)
dobj(write-6, post-11)
advmod(write-6, ever-12)
mark(started-15, since-13)
nsubj(started-15, I-14)
advcl(write-6, started-15)
xcomp(started-15, experimenting-16)
prep(experimenting-16, with-17)
pobj(with-17, pizzas-18)
num(years-20, three-19)
npadvmod(ago-21, years-20)
advmod(pizzas-18, ago-21)
cc(started-15, but-22)
neg(started-15, never-23)
advmod(got-25, really-24)
conj(started-15, got-25)
dobj(got-25, round-26)
prep(got-25, to-27)
pobj(to-27, it-28)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NN motivation))
    (VP (VBD came)
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN form))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ new) (NNP SMEG) (NNP Pizza) (NNP Oven))
              (SBAR
                (WHNP (WDT which))
                (S
                  (VP (VBD made)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP it))
                      (ADJP (JJ possible))
                      (SBAR (IN for)
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP me))
                          (VP (TO to)
                            (VP
                              (ADVP (RB finally))
                              (VB make)
                              (NP
                                (NP
                                  (NP (DT a) (NN pizza))
                                  (NP (DT the) (NN way)))
                                (SBAR
                                  (S
                                    (NP (PRP I))
                                    (VP (VBP want)
                                      (PP (TO to))
                                      (PP (IN at)
                                        (NP (NN home))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (FRAG (CC or)
    (ADVP
      (ADVP (RB anywhere) (RB else))
      (SBAR (IN for)
        (S
          (NP (DT that) (NN matter))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN problem))
              (PP (IN of)
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB how))
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB bake)
                        (NP (PRP it)))))))))))
      (. .))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (JJ conventional) (NN home) (NN oven))
      (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
        (ADJP (JJ suitable)
          (PP (IN for)
            (S
              (VP (VBG making)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ real) (NNP Napolitana) (NN style) (NN pizza))
                (ADVP (RB principally))))))
        (SBAR (IN because)
          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NN oven))
            (VP (VBZ is) (RB not)
              (ADJP (JJ hot) (RB enough)))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBZ does) (RB n't)
        (VP (VB have)
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (JJ hot) (NN surface))
            (SBAR
              (WHADVP (WRB where))
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (MD can)
                  (VP (VB place)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN pizza)
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB cook)))))))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (EX There))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN lid))
          (PP (IN at)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN bottom))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NN oven))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT which))
                    (S
                      (VP (MD can)
                        (VP (VB be)
                          (VP (VBN removed)))))))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (DT a) (NN round) (NN pizza) (NN stone))
      (VP (MD can)
        (VP (VB be)
          (VP (VBN placed)
            (ADVP (RB directly))
            (PP (IN on)
              (S
                (NP
                  (NP (NN top))
                  (PP (IN of)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN heating) (NN element))))
                (ADVP (RB effectively))
                (VP (VBG turning)
                  (NP (PRP it))
                  (PP (IN into)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ hearth) (NN oven))))))))))
    (. !)))

    (NP (DT The) (NN stone))

        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB heat)
            (NP
              (NP
                (QP (IN up) (TO to) (CD 280))
                (NNS degrees))
              (CC and)
              (NP (PRP$ its)

                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB bake)
                        (NP
                          (NP (DT a) (NN pizza))

                            (NP (CD 4))))))))
                (NNS mins)))))))

    (. !)))

            (S
              (NP (NNP Water) (NNPS 360ml))

                (NP (CD 1\/4) (NN tsp) (NNS Notes)))))
          (: :))))))

          (NP (NN wait) (CD 20)))))
    (VP (VBP min)
      (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
        (S
          (VP (VBZ allows)
            (NP (NN flour))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB absorb)
                  (NP (NN water))
                  (ADVP (RB properly)))))))
        (-RRB- -RRB-))
      (NP (CD 5)))
    (. .)))

prep(Cover-1, with-2)
amod(cloth-4, damp-3)
pobj(with-2, cloth-4)
cc(cloth-4, and-5)
conj(cloth-4, wait-6)
num(wait-6, 20-7)
root(ROOT-0, min-8)
parataxis(min-8, allows-10)
dobj(allows-10, flour-11)
aux(absorb-13, to-12)

dobj(absorb-13, water-14)

dobj(min-8, 5-17)

      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB be)
            (ADJP (JJ wet))))))
    (. .)))

                        (NP (PRP it))

            (NP (PRP it))
            (ADJP (RB too) (JJ long))))))

    (VP (VBZ loses)
      (NP (DT that) (NN quality)))
    (. .)))
